pageProduct.name: Palmers Cocoa Butter Calming Cream Cleanser 150g
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Palmer's® Cocoa Butter Formula Skin Nourishing Calming Cream Cleanser gently purifies skin, removes excess surface oils and impurities, and assists in removing makeup, whilst helping skin maintain its own moisture balance.

Warnings

For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets into eyes, rinse thoroughly with water. Keep out of reach of children.

Common Uses

Low foaming for moisture balanced skin, while gently removing excess oils and impurities. Dermatologist Tested. Safe for Sensitive Skin.

Ingredients

Water (Aqua), Caprylic/Cparic Triglyceride, Glycerin, Isodecane, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Extract, Butylene Glycol, Isopopyl Palmitate, Polysorbate 20, Glyceryl Oleate Citrate, Prunus Amygdalus Dulcis (Sweet Almond) Oil, Octyldodecanol, Theobroma Cacao (Cocoa) Seed Butter, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Sodium Hyaluronate, Tocoperhol, Helianthus Annuus (Sunflower) Seed Oil, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Juice, Oenothera Biennis (Evening Primrose) Flower Extract, Elaeis Guineensis (Palm) Oil, Glyceryl Stearate, PEG-100 Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Acrylates/C10-30 Alkyl Acrylate Crosspolymer, Xanthan Gum, Silica, Sodium Hydroxide, Citric Acid, Disodium EDTA, Propylene Glycol, Potassium Sorbate, Sodium Benzoate, Fragrance (Parfum), Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Alcohol, Coumarin.

Directions

Apply to wet skin with a gentle circular motion creating a light lather, then rinse completely. Follow with Palmer's Cocoa Butter Formula Moisturising Day Cream or Moisture Rich Night Cream for perfectly hydrated skin.
